FuncDef: The reset multicast egress statistics command clears statistics about downstream Layer 3 IPv4 multicast packets.
CLIs: reset multicast egress statistics [ vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ] <source-address> <group-address> slot <slot-id>
reset multicast egress statistics slot <slot-id> all

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a VPN instance name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 characters.

Specifies a multicast source address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies a multicast group address.
The value ranges from 224.0.1.0 to 239.255.255.255, in dotted decimal notation.

-
The value is a string of 1 to 15 characters, spaces not supported.

Clears statistics about downstream Layer 3 IPv4 multicast packets for all multicast groups.
-

Examples: [~HUAWEI] reset multicast egress statistics vpn1 10.10.10.10 225.0.0.1 slot 1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To clear statistics about downstream Layer 3 IPv4 multicast packets, run the reset multicast egress statistics command.
Prerequisites
The function of collecting statistics about downstream Layer 3 IPv4 multicast packets has been enabled using the multicast egress statistics vpn-instance source-address group-address slot or multicast egress statistics enable slot command.
